definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: For the study, published in the September issue of Pediatrics, researchers identified 28 babies who spent time in the NICU and were later diagnosed with an autism spectrum disorder.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究发表在九月份的《儿科》杂志上面。

sentences.english: In other words, be tactful, but don’t be afraid to give your honest opinion.
sentences.chinese: 换言之，要机智，但是别怕发表你真实的意见。

sentences.english: Publication of academic works on more than 10 articles and two monographs.
sentences.chinese: 发表学术论著10余篇和参编专著2本。

sentences.english: When the article arrived, the editor read the first sentence and then refused to publish it.
sentences.chinese: 稿子寄来后，编辑看第一句话就拒绝予以发表。

sentences.english: Ono released a statement Tuesday night in tribute to Lennon.
sentences.chinese: 小野周二晚上发表的一份声明中赞扬侬。

sentences.english: Sippy and directed by Ramesh Sippy, released in 1975.
sentences.chinese: 播出，并指示由拉梅什风格，发表于1975年。

sentences.english: The results will be reported in scientific journals in the near future" , said Dr Vallotton."
sentences.chinese: 不久的将来，其结果将会发表在学术刊物上。

sentences.english: He wasshowferedchauffeured away soon thereafter with no public statement.
sentences.chinese: 他没对公众发表讲话就被车接走。

sentences.english: You should try to acquaint yourself with the facts, before you express an opinion.
sentences.chinese: 在发表看法前，你应该先了解事实真相。

sentences.english: Run out of breakfast, I logged an innovative composition network, began to publish the article.
sentences.chinese: 用完早餐，我又登录了创新作文网，开始发表文章。

sentences.english: The old-time thrill at receiving a publisher's check was gone.
sentences.chinese: 以前那种发表作品收到支票时的激动已经没有了。

sentences.english: You are not allowed to post as this user.
sentences.chinese: 您不能以这个用户发表文章。

sentences.english: The leadership issued a statement denying any favoritism.
sentences.chinese: 公约领导层发表一份声明表示否认有任何偏袒。

sentences.english: They published their findings in a recent issue of the Journal of Sexual Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 他们在最近的性医学期刊中发表了其调查结果。

sentences.english: Analysis and comment are made on the floating cylinder sleeve method known in late years.
sentences.chinese: 对近几年来发表的浮动缸套测量法进行了分析和评述。

sentences.english: We publish about 35 letters each week.
sentences.chinese: 我们每周大约发表35封信件。

definition: to carry a story/to publish (in a newspaper or magazine)
paper/treatise/thesis/CL:篇[pian1]/to discuss a paper or thesis (old)
